description: Convenient straw and superb insulation provides all day hydration on the go.<br><br>Designed to keep your drinks cold for over 30 hours, these bottles are built to withstand various conditions, allowing you to stay hydrated throughout the day, no matter where you are. Our innovative Microlite technology optimizes thermal performance while keeping the weight to a minimum, making it effortless to carry and use.
name: Microlite 710 Bottle Straw Top 710ml / 24oz

specs.value: Recycled Stainless Steel, Recycled PP, PE, Silicone, Rubber
